history.content:
The Student Affairs Division has asked that we share with you their revised procedures for making various sorts of grievances, should you find that necessary during your time on campus.

Here is the Berkeley site for finding resources for filing grievances with the university if something goes seriously awry.

#pin
history.subject: UC Berkeley Grievance Procedures
